00437     typedef struct PaDeviceInfo {
00438         int structVersion;  /* this is struct version 2 */
00439         const char *name;
00440         PaHostApiIndex hostApi; /* note this is a host API index, not a type id*/
00441 
00442         int maxInputChannels;

00444 
00445         /* Default latency values for interactive performance. */
00446         PaTime defaultLowInputLatency;
00447         PaTime defaultLowOutputLatency;
00448         /* Default latency values for robust non-interactive applications (eg. playing sound files). */
00449         PaTime defaultHighInputLatency;
00450         PaTime defaultHighOutputLatency;

00453     }
